text: The 2020–21 Northwestern Wildcats men's basketball team will represent Northwestern University in the 2020–21 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. Led by eighth-year head coach Chris Collins, the Wildcats will play their home games at Welsh-Ryan Arena in Evanston, Illinois as members of the Big Ten Conference. ==Previous season== The Wildcats finished the 2019–20 season 8–22, 3–17 to finish in 13th place in Big Ten play. They lost in the first round of the Big Ten Tournament to Minnesota. == Offseason == === Departures === {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" ! Name !! Number !! Pos. !! Height !! Weight !!
